channel.title: Apartment Therapy | Saving the world, one room at a time
channel.description: Saving the world, one room at a time

item.title: Lauren's Resourceful Style Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Lauren
Location:
Pawtucket, RI
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
Lily and I absolutely love the high ceilings and exposed brick. We have a good mix of old and new: a letterpress from 1915 and furniture we have purchased over time. I also love that we have been resourceful with how we have put our room together. We are both young professionals with big dreams and small incomes, so a lot of furniture was customized by us along with the rest of the apartment.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Maria's Art Arrangement Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Maria
Location:
San Jose, CA
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
I love the big window, the turquoise walls, and all the colorful art. I've heard that bedrooms should be more subdued and relaxing, but I'd quickly get bored with a subdued room, plus, I can't see any of the art when the lights are off, so going to sleep is not a problem. I love having a TV in the bedroom, but I didn't want it to be a focal point in the room, so I hid it in a frame collage. When the TV is on, it looks like moving art!


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Laura's Simple White Walled Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Laura
Location:
Brooklyn, NY
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
The big windows, high ceilings, maple floors. I have lived in my apartment for 23 years and have tried various sleeping arrangements: a loft bed, a single bed, several different full-size beds (with headboard and without). What I've got now seems to work well and is very versatile. I just need to paint a wall and change the sheets/blanket, and it's a new room. Some of the photos show recent, different versions of my bedroom. The large painting in front of the window was a curbside find. I live on a really noisy street and the windows face south, so it's bright. The painting gives me a bit more privacy.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Joy's Beach Lovers Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Joy
Location:
Fairfax, VA
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
My husband and I are avid beach-lovers and design enthusiasts, so I love that our room is a moody blend of both. Rustic beach house meets sophisticated comfort. Some of my favorite things are the gray linen headboard which I DIY'ed when I was 9 months pregnant (I don't recommend this...) and the pallet wood frame I built for the Wyeth print hanging above the dresser. We also picked out the piece of driftwood from a little roadside shop on one of our vacations. These things make the room feel like it is actually ours and not just a pretty space. I love how the layered textures and graphic, monochromatic patterns combine to create an atmosphere of relaxed sophistication.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: 3 Minutes to a More Organized Home — Apartment Therapy Video Roundup
item.description:
This week, Fay Wolf shared with us how to make your life easier by storing things where you use them. Here's that video and two more of Fay's videos from our archives, with quick and easy organizational tips that will have you wondering: why didn't I think of that?

More
item.author: Nancy Mitchell

item.title: Cynthia's Calm Retreat Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Cynthia
Location:
Toronto Canada
Division:
International
What do you love about your bedroom?:
I love that our bedroom is a calm retreat in a sea of constant excitement. With three young children, jobs, and lots on the go, my husband Graham and I wanted to create a sanctuary. For us, that meant a soft palette of whites and greys, a comfortable splurge bed that’s big enough for the whole family to snuggle in, a statement piece of art, over-scaled lighting, and fabulous storage.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: A Symphony in Blue in Madrid — Trendland
item.description:
According to TrendLand, Jaime Lacasa is "one of the most stylish men in Madrid." After seeing these photos of his home, we are inclined to agree. 

More
item.author: Nancy Mitchell

item.title: Find Your Favorites: Friday's Entries — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
It's the end of the week and you need to unwind. Pour yourself a glass of wine and click through today's new Bedroom Contest entries. Check them all out and if you like what you see, be sure to click the heart on their post to make them a "favorite" and help move them up on the leaderboard.

  • Christine's Calming Palette Bedroom
  • Natalie's Spacious Bedroom
  • Chris & Scott's Spacious & Simple Bedroom
  • Cali's Simple & Sweet Bedroom
  • James' Wooden Wall Bedrooom
  • Sue's Sun Shine In Bedroom
  • Alison's Cheerful Oasis Bedroom
  • Mary's Calm & Serene Bedroom
  • Mayumi's Color Balanced Bedroom
  • Tyler's Anything is Possible Bedroom
  • Britney's Bedside Storage Bedroom
  • Beth's Books & Art Bedroom


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Britney's Bedside Storage Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Brittney
Location:
Memphis, TN
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
I love that it's colorful and eclectic - but still relaxing - and that so many pieces with family history have a home there.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Chic & Beautiful: White Walls with Style — Renters Solutions
item.description: Even if you can't or don't want to paint, living with white walls does not have to be boring. White walls can be the perfect background to keep a space feeling neutral and bright or as a contrast to colorful furniture, home accessories or artwork. In these examples from our house tours, we see that classic white walls can be chic and desirable. More
item.author: Liana Walker

item.title: Beth's Books & Art Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Beth
Location:
Brooklyn, NY
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
We love the original pre-war details of the room, the moldings, the parquet floors. It's huge for New York, which is great. We both always dreamed of having a full wall of bookshelves and we finally do! We're also pretty proud of our growing art display above the bed.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Make a Memory Jar — What To Do This Weekend
item.description:
Ah, good times. Here are five projects that help your kids remember what they did, where they went, who they did it with, and why they love you.

  • Vacation Memory Jar
  • Family Time Capsule
  • Yearly Highlights Jar
  • "I Love You" Jar
  • Jar Photo Frames

(Images: as linked above)
item.author: Dabney Frake

item.title: Tyler's Anything is Possible Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Tyler
Location:
Clermont, FL
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
The ceilings and the windows are really tall allowing a lot of light during the day. It's also tucked in the back of the unit so it is very quiet at night. The apartment itself used to be a store front and when the businesses closed the owners turned them in to living units so it has a very quirky and unique layout.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: How Much is Your Stuff Worth?
item.description:
I've been looking into ways to get myself and my stuff across the country, and the two big moving truck rental companies both estimate my rental cost at $1,400, plus approximately $1,000 in gas. I am fairly certain that the value of all my worldly possessions does not equal $2,400...

More
item.author: Tess Wilson

item.title: 10 Budget Wine Picks For a Polenta Dinner
item.description:
It was 'polenta party' time at Faith's house last week, and she served it with a delicious dish of beef braised in red wine. So, the big question we pondered was, what wine or rather what wines to serve alongside this robust, meaty, yet creamy dish?

• 10 Budget Wine Picks
  The Kitchn
item.author: Cambria Bold

item.title: Mayumi's Color Balanced Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Mayumi
Location:
Bonita, CA
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
We replaced the old window with a French door so that the room would feel more open and allow more light to come in. What a difference! Now the room is much brighter and roomier. I like the wall color too. The color is Benjamin Moore's "Abalone". It is a very relaxing and soothing color. I enjoy repurposing and restoring old things I buy at thrift stores. It is always fun to turn them into something unique and add lots of personal touches to them.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: Get the Look: Modern Canopy Bed
item.description:
I love the look of the canopy bed in this bedroom. Simple and classic and yet modern and fresh. I scoured the internet looking for this bed (found it!) and in the process rounded up a few really lovely modern canopy beds.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: What Helps You Sleep?
item.description:
I sleep with a white noise machine at night and (hear me out when I tell you this) it's not for me, it's for my dog. Indirectly, it really is for me, because when she gets woken up by the tiniest noise, she makes sure to get me up as well to investigate.


More
item.author: Kim Lucian

item.title: Mary's Calm & Serene Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Mary
Location:
Blue Hill, ME
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
I love the calm and serene feeling I get when I am in our bedroom. I love the seascape artwork we have collected, and I love the views of the bay from the windows.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: A Renter's Life in L.A.:The Inside Scoop — Apartment Therapy's Renters Guide
item.description:
If I tried to fully describe Los Angeles to you, we'd be here all day; it's just too vast. Whatever you think LA is, you're right-- it's that and much more.  More than boobs, Botox and bottle service, we have a multi-cultural population, a diverse landscape and a thriving arts community.  And traffic...lots of traffic.  Still interested?  Okay, okay, I'll break it down for you.  


More
item.author: Jennifer Hunter

item.title: Alison's Cheerful Oasis Bedroom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
Alison
Location:
S Askatoon Canada
Division:
International
What do you love about your bedroom?:
My bedroom is a cheerful oasis and the best place to recharge after a busy day in the studio. All of the furniture is designed and built by us. This gives me a huge sense of pride as well.


More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: What Not To Compost or Recycle: 30 Items to Avoid — Mother Nature Network
item.description:
Composting and recycling seem like straightforward systems, but as with most processes, there are shades of gray to the black and white designations of "plastic", "paper", and "glass".  

More
item.author: Julia Brenner

item.title: The Weekend Guide: March 22, 2013 — National, Local & Online Sales & Events Calendar
item.description:
We officially crossed the line into Spring this week. The birds are singing, the sun is sticking around a little longer and retailers are starting their Spring sales. We've rounded up some of these spring sales, along with other design and home related events, for this Weekend Guide. Check it all out, pass it on and be sure to send us your own sale or event for future editions of the Guide.

More
item.author: Jason Loper

item.title: James' Wooden Wall Bedrooom — My Bedroom Retreat Contest
item.description:
Like this My Bedroom Retreat contest entry? Favorite it below!
Name:
James
Location:
Dallas , TX
Division:
United States
What do you love about your bedroom?:
I love how cozy it is. It has a definite rustic masculine vibe ... but at the same time, modern elements. Like sleeping in a modern cabin retreat. Of course there can never be enough layers ... pillows, down comforters, or Navajo prints.


More
item.author: Jason Loper
